واضح جدا أن الفيسبوك بيقلب في كل الداتا اللي على الموبايل و من ضمنهم الايميل. انا دلوقتي بلاقيه جايبلي أشخاص مقترحين مفيش بيني و بينهم أي صلة و لا اتصال غير اميل بعتوه أو كانوا على ال Cc في ايميل مبعوتلي.
حد ملاحظ ده؟

Regular Expression Matching Can Be Simple And Fast (but is slow in Java, Perl, PHP, Python, Ruby, ...)

This is a tale of two approaches to regular expression matching. One of them is in widespread use in the standard interpreters for many languages, including Perl. The other is used only in a few places, notably most implementations of awk and grep. The two approaches have wildly different performance characteristics ...
posts.caption: swtch.com

posts.message:
سؤال تاريخي شويه.. كانت السي شارب 1 أو البيتا بتعمل إيرور لو ناديت على Method بترجع قيمه كأنها بترجع void ؟

bool MyMethod(string x..etc

bool a = MyMethod("something") is OK but calling it this way
MyMethod("something") produces a compile-time error because the returned value should be stored somewhere
?
واللا ده كان حلم؟ هل فيه لغات تانيه بتعمل/كانت-بتعمل كدا؟

posts.message: Guys we are launching soon, what will be the categories you will need/offer ? :)
posts.description:
Do you have an idea you want to make it real but you need skilled people with you? Then comment below which skills would you need in those people (like: web development, etc..), and which skills would you offer to them in return (like: logo design, photography, etc..).

http://lemoow.com/ Exchange tasks with skilled people!
